EmailTemplate.name: PM Payment request approval task
EmailTemplate.subject: Payment Request submitted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!PaymentRequest__c.ProgramManager__c} ,
This email is to notify you that, the Payment Request #{!PaymentRequest__c.Name} has been submitted for the Grant #{!PaymentRequest__c.Grant__c} and is pending your approval .
Payment Request Details:
Award: #{!PaymentRequest__c.Award__c}
Project Period: {!PaymentRequest__c.ProjectStartDate__c} - {!PaymentRequest__c.ProjectEndDate__c}
Kindly login to the UtahGrants Systems and start reviewing the payment request
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the Utah Grants Support Team at utahgrants.support@reisystems.com, if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
UtahGrants Support Team utahgrants.support@reisystems.com Ph. No. 703.480.9100
